definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Members of the Farmers' Association descended upon Kentucky for their annual conference.
sentences.chinese: 農民協會成員突然造訪肯德基的年會。

sentences.english: They visit quite frequently with their flying saucers and invasive experiments.
sentences.chinese: 藉助飛碟及其他侵入的實驗頻繁造訪人類。

sentences.english: He was dozing in the hammock when I called.
sentences.chinese: 當我造訪時他正在帆布吊牀上打瞌睡。

sentences.english: Do you think “Hotshot” condoms will ever make a visit to the U.S.?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲“Hotshot”安全套會造訪美國嗎？

sentences.english: I first visited Okutan's Kiyomizu branch almost 7 years ago in winter 2009.
sentences.chinese: 第一次造訪“湯豆腐奧丹”，是2009年冬天。

sentences.english: An old duck visits the mother duck.
sentences.chinese: 一隻老鴨前來造訪母鴨。

sentences.english: Or hit up every urban hotspot with your old buddies from college?
sentences.chinese: 還是和你大學時候的老同學一起造訪每個城市。

sentences.english: During the Middle Ages, many Christians visited Rome because it was where the Pope lived.
sentences.chinese: 中古時代，許多基督徒因教宗住在當地而造訪羅馬。

sentences.english: Thank you for coming all the way to my company.
sentences.chinese: 感謝各位專程遠道造訪本公司。

sentences.english: I've noticed that I get inspired at the weirdest times.
sentences.chinese: 我發現靈感總是在最不尋常的時間造訪。

sentences.english: Actually, five German expeditions had already visited the Xinguano people and lands.
sentences.chinese: 其實，已有五支德國探險隊造訪過興谷族人與該地區。

sentences.english: That night, Scrooge is visited by three ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，有三個鬼魂造訪了斯克魯奇。

sentences.english: By Saturday, March 31, Carter had decided to pay a personal visit to Harrisburg.
sentences.chinese: 3月31日，卡特決定要親自造訪哈里斯堡。

sentences.english: Shall we drop in on John?
sentences.chinese: 我們乘便造訪一下約翰嗎？

sentences.english: Recording space, sweat haired Liao accepted the reporter's late-night visit.
sentences.chinese: 錄製間隙，滿頭大汗的廖健接受記者的深夜造訪。

sentences.english: It was officially announced during Seung Heon nim's first official visit to Japan on 12th December.
sentences.chinese: 消息在承憲12日第一次造訪日本時宣佈了。

definition: to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to look at sth with pleasure/to watch (sth marvelous)/ornamental
to pay a visit/to call on
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
